sentences.en: A clergyman read the liturgy from the prayer-book.
sentences.cn: 一名牧师照着祈祷书念祷文。

sentences.en: God has answered your prayer .
sentences.cn: 上帝应许了你的祷告。

sentences.en: he doesn't have a prayer of toppling Tyson.
sentences.cn: 他根本不可能战胜泰森。

sentences.en: He saw his vocation as one of prayer and apostolic work.
sentences.cn: 他认为从事祷告和门徒的工作是他的使命。

sentences.en: He should consider offering up a prayer to St Lambert.
sentences.cn: 他应当考虑向圣朗贝尔祷告。

sentences.en: His prayer moved me to tears.
sentences.cn: 他的祈祷把我感动得热泪盈眶。

sentences.en: I offered up a short prayer for forgiveness.
sentences.cn: 我做了个简短的祷告，祈求宽恕。

sentences.en: It is real prayer, and not mechanical repetition.
sentences.cn: 这是真正的祈祷，不是机械的重复。

sentences.en: Our thoughts and prayers are with you at this difficult time.
sentences.cn: 在这艰难时期我们时刻思念你，为你祈祷。

sentences.en: She offered a silent prayer of thanks.
sentences.cn: 她默默祈祷以表谢意。

sentences.en: She'd been caught from behind and hadn't a prayer of freeing herself.
sentences.cn: 有人从后面抓住她，她不可能脱身。

sentences.en: The children said their prayers and got into bed.
sentences.cn: 孩子们做完祷告后上床睡觉了。

sentences.en: The Colonel bowed his head and whispered a prayer of thanksgiving.
sentences.cn: 这位上校低头轻声做感恩祈祷。

sentences.en: The pastor requested the women present to join him in prayer.
sentences.cn: 牧师请在场的妇女们和他一起祈祷。

sentences.en: the power of prayer
sentences.cn: 祈祷的力量

sentences.en: The priest intoned the final prayer.
sentences.cn: 神父庄重地念了最后的祷文。

sentences.en: There is a ceremony of prayer and flagellation before the dancing begins.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈开始前会举行祈祷和鞭笞的仪式。

sentences.en: Uncle Richard intoned a chapter from the Bible and improvised a prayer.
sentences.cn: 理查德叔叔吟诵了《圣经》中的一章，又即兴作了一段祈祷文。

sentences.en: We concluded the meeting at eight o'clock with a prayer.
sentences.cn: 我们在八点钟以祈祷结束了会议.

sentences.en: We heard the calling of the bells to prayer.
sentences.cn: 我们听见了召唤祈祷的钟声.

trans.tran_cn: 祈祷，祷词，祈望，祈祷仪式
trans.tran_en: words that you say when praying to God or gods
